text: Kirill Shevchenko (; born 22 September 2002 in Kiev) is a Ukrainian chess grandmaster. ==Chess career== Born in 2002, Shevchenko earned his international master title in 201687th FIDE Congress 2016, 1-14 September, Baku, Azerbaijan FIDE and his grandmaster title in 2017 at the age of 14 years 10 months.88th FIDE Congress 2017, 7-15 October, Goynuk, Antalya, Turkey FIDE In February 2018, he competed in the Aeroflot Open and finished fifty-first out of ninety-two, scoring 4½/9 (+2–2=5). In March 2018, he competed in the European Individual Chess Championship and placed thirty-second, scoring 7½/11 (+6–2=3). Kirill is the best U18 player in Ukraine, and 7th best U18 player in the world as of June 2020. He is ranked 20th in Ukraine as of June 2020. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Chess grandmasters Category:Sportspeople from Kyiv Category:Ukrainian chess players
title: Kirill Shevchenko
